relationships.description: Harry and Ron exchanged looks with Hermione.
Mr Weasley and Mrs Weasley appeared together with Ginny.
Harry bought owl nuts from Eeylops Owl Emporium.
Ron bought owl nuts from Eeylops Owl Emporium.
Mr Weasley's sons run Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.
Fred and George run Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.
